document.full_text: the rapid rise of e-books could lead to a "reading divide" as those unable to afford the new technology are left behind, even as u.s. reading and writing skills decline still further.
document.title: technological changes may lead to "reading divide"
lines_and_colors: the rapid rise of e-books could lead to a "reading divide" as those unable to afford the new technology are left behind, even as u.s. reading and writing skills decline still further.
